text: Ridgley is an unincorporated community in Barry County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Ridgley was established in 1909, and remained in operation until 1919. The community's lofty elevation atop a ridge accounts for the name. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Barry County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Ridgley, Missouri
